cheatsheet.title: Other actions available for testing menus

intro.description: You can also perform checks on menus with GUIdancer. You can check the enablement of an item, whether an item exists, and whether an item is selected.

item.title: Finding the check actions for menus
item.description: From the unbound modules, browse to the category: Actions (basic) > Check > Menu Bar.

subitem.label: You will see that there are Test Cases to check the enablement, existence and selection of menu items.
For each option, there are two Test Cases. The Test Cases differ in the way the path to the item is given (indexpath or textpath).
As well as the path (and, for the textpath option, operator) parameters, you also have to enter a true/false value about your expectations for the result of the check.
